name: ROYGBIV: The Game
short_description:
ROYGBIV: A color-based action game. Defend your base against an ever-growing swarm of color-based aggressors! 

Select a color on the left side of the screen. Your base will shoot lasers of the most recently chosen color out into the world. Match lasers with enemies to destroy them and jack up your score! Watch out, however: let the enemies slip by your defenses, and you'll lose the game!
summary: ROYGBIV: The Game. A Comp 50 Project
